entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH, Roberval
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:37 p.m. EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, 2.2Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Roberval Airport 10:00 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
Condition: Light Snowshower
Temperature: 2.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 48 km
Humidity: 66 %
Dewpoint: -3.4°C
Wind: SSE 21 km/h gust 39 km/h

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. Flurries at times heavy beginning late this evening. Risk of snow squalls late this evening and overnight. Local blowing snow late this evening and overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 70 late this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
